roleset.name: stick, cause to stick, stuck to something

role.descr: agent, entity causing two objects to be attached

example.name: tied to
example.text: The equity kicker is not attached to the offering, ...

example.name: ARG1 and ARG0 and ARG2
example.text: The importance that parents attach to education is of course a strong point for Taiwan , but one drawback of this is that parents often set their expectations too high .

example.name: arg 1 when only 1 attached item is mentioned
All args
example.text: It looks like it was attached to the wall by two dry wall anchors which were not attached to the stud.
example.arg: by two dry wall anchors which were not attached to the stud.

roleset.note: ATTACHMENT-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Slight comparison to attach.01. Attach.01 is a member of VN class shake-22.3-2-1. No FN class.Framed by Katie (from attachment.01-n)
ATTACHED-J NOTES: Roleset based on BOLT P01. (from attached.01-j)

Note that multiple arg-1 tags are possible in a single instance. (from attach.01-v) I've added an arg 2 so we no longer have multiple arg 1s appearing (from attachment.01-n)Roles differ from verb roles for attach.01 because verb conflated two objects into one arg. (from attached.01-j)
